EmailTemplate.name: Send Thank You/Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia Application # {!Case.CaseNumber}: Congratulations and Welcome to the Nokia Partner Program!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.PB_First_Name__c},
Congratulations and welcome to the Nokia Partner Program. Your application has been approved and {!Case.Full_Legal_Name_of_Your_Organization_CP__c} is now a recognized Nokia Authorized Partner in the following countries:
{!Case.Approved_Countries__c}
Note: Nokia has rejected your application to re-sell in the following countries:
{!Case.Rejected_Countries__c}
Here are some of the benefits youâ€™ll enjoy as an Authorized Nokia partner: Access to our Partner Portal, which includes access to Nokia Training and Certifications, technical documentation and marketing tools Access to product configurators The flexibility to offer Nokia brand of service, joint or your own brand of service
Please register for access to the Portal, which is step #1. Please encourage your team to register, as well. https://services.support.alcatel-lucent.com/registration/PartnerRegistration.pdf
We are excited to partner with {!Case.Full_Legal_Name_of_Your_Organization_CP__c} to help you to grow your revenues, your profitability and your business!
If you have any questions or comments, please contact us at:
Partner.registration@nokia.com
Happy Selling!
The Nokia Global Partner Team
